name: QrPixelDebugOptions
summary: Options for QR pixel debug rendering.

properties.name: OutputScale
properties.summary: Upscale factor for the output visualization (default 1).

properties.name: BoxBlurRadius
properties.summary: Apply a box blur before thresholding (radius in pixels).

properties.name: NormalizeBackground
properties.summary: Normalize background gradients using local mean subtraction.

properties.name: AdaptiveOffset
properties.summary: Offset subtracted from the local mean (0..255).

properties.name: Invert
properties.summary: Invert black/white classification for binarized/heatmap outputs.
